alert.note: Alert for Buffalo (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 12:00AM CDT until June 29 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Buffalo County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mondovi, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mondovi around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mondovi Airfield, Gilmanton, The Big Swamp Area, Urne and Lookout. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
